name: Isolated Intelligence
description:
Isolated Intelligence is a fun and atmospheric cooperative platformer. You have to grapple, swing, and use abilities to solve puzzles and figure out what happened to the ship and the residents aboard.

Developed by 10 Algonquin College students over an eight month period for a final project. 

Requirements:

  • 2 Players
  • Internet Connection
